settings.desc:
This Page and its contained products are in no way affiliated with SpaceX Starlink.
<hr>
All support and warranty claims for products purchased through this site will be handled directly with SpaceTek - Starlink Shop Pty. Ltd. on behalf its customers and of its third party suppliers.ore details, promotions, or brand content with your customers.

settings.title: Art to inspire, design to discover
settings.description: Welcome to The Marco Store by Francis, a one-stop shop dedicated to supporting and promoting United State independent makers, from artists to candlemakers, ceramicists to clothing designers. Itâ€™s an ever-evolving marketplace that brings together objects of desire chosen by our network of curators, each an expert in their chosen field, be it design advocate David Backham, art consultant Gbriel Jesus or fashion stylist Inez Garcia. They all bring a singular vision to The Marco Store â€“ to share their knowledge and enthusiasm with you.

settings.title: Who we are?
settings.description: The Marco Store is one of the world's leading online retailers for luxury fashion. The Marco Store success story began in 2006 as a small online shop associated with the multi-brand store Marco., which has been the pillar of style, quality and luxury fashion competence in Munich for more than 25 years. Today, over 500 employees work together to create an unforgettable online shopping experience. What makes Marco Store so unique? A one-of-a-kind selection of products from 200 of the most important designer collections, outstanding customer service, as well as fast and reliable delivery to more than 120 countries all over the world.

settings.title: What we do?
settings.description: Through the Marco. store, our buying team has established a loyal and faithful connection to a large number of brands and attends fashion shows in New York, London, Milan, and Paris each season. The key pieces and best looks from the collections are ordered on location and directly from the designer. The selection is made according to the Marco Store philosophy: only those pieces that are elegant as well as trend-setting make it into the online shop.

settings.earnpointsurl: Your items may arrive sooner than the estimated delivery date. Ralph Lauren reserves the right to send packages via other shipping methods based on the shipping destination as long as orders will still arrive within the arrival times outlined on RalphLauren.com. When you choose the Economy delivery option, packages are delivered Monday through Saturday 8 AM to 4:30 PM. Orders sent by Fast, 2-Business-Day or Next-Day shipping methods are delivered Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 4:30 PM. We recommend choosing Fast or Next-Day delivery if you are shipping your package to a business address. You will be asked to provide a telephone number on the shipping page of checkout, which is important in the event the courier needs to arrange a delivery time with you. You will also be asked to provide an email address, to which we will send confirmation that your order was placed.
settings.custombox_text:
November Sale Save 20%! *
Enter code NOV20 at checkout
(*) To redeem, enter promotion code NOV20 at checkout. This inclusive promo applies to items that have this coupon visable on their respective product pages.
settings.customtab1_content:
SHIPPING INFORMATION

Order Restrictions

Fast, 2-Business-Day, Next-Day, and Saturday delivery options are not available for orders containing fragrances, lighting, rugs, and orders greater than 30 units. Lamps will ship with the base and the shade as 2 separate packages. Gift cards are shipped separately free of charge.

Delivery Timing

Your items may arrive sooner than the estimated delivery date. Ralph Lauren reserves the right to send packages via other shipping methods based on the shipping destination as long as orders will still arrive within the arrival times outlined on RalphLauren.com. When you choose the Economy delivery option, packages are delivered Monday through Saturday 8 AM to 4:30 PM. Orders sent by Fast, 2-Business-Day or Next-Day shipping methods are delivered Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 4:30 PM. We recommend choosing Fast or Next-Day delivery if you are shipping your package to a business address. You will be asked to provide a telephone number on the shipping page of checkout, which is important in the event the courier needs to arrange a delivery time with you. You will also be asked to provide an email address, to which we will send confirmation that your order was placed.

settings.earnpointsurl: Your items may arrive sooner than the estimated delivery date. Ralph Lauren reserves the right to send packages via other shipping methods based on the shipping destination as long as orders will still arrive within the arrival times outlined on RalphLauren.com. When you choose the Economy delivery option, packages are delivered Monday through Saturday 8 AM to 4:30 PM. Orders sent by Fast, 2-Business-Day or Next-Day shipping methods are delivered Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 4:30 PM. We recommend choosing Fast or Next-Day delivery if you are shipping your package to a business address. You will be asked to provide a telephone number on the shipping page of checkout, which is important in the event the courier needs to arrange a delivery time with you. You will also be asked to provide an email address, to which we will send confirmation that your order was placed.

Fast, 2-Business-Day, Next-Day, and Saturday delivery options are not available for orders containing fragrances, lighting, rugs, and orders greater than 30 units. Lamps will ship with the base and the shade as 2 separate packages. Gift cards are shipped separately free of charge.

You will be asked to provide a telephone number on the shipping page of checkout, which is important in the event the courier needs to arrange a delivery time with you. You will also be asked to provide an email address, to which we will send confirmation that your order was placed.
settings.custombox_text:
November Sale Save 20%! *
Enter code NOV20 at checkout
(*) To redeem, enter promotion code NOV20 at checkout. This inclusive promo applies to items that have this coupon visable on their respective product pages.
settings.customtab1_content:
SHIPPING INFORMATION

Order Restrictions

Fast, 2-Business-Day, Next-Day, and Saturday delivery options are not available for orders containing fragrances, lighting, rugs, and orders greater than 30 units. Lamps will ship with the base and the shade as 2 separate packages. Gift cards are shipped separately free of charge.

Delivery Timing

Your items may arrive sooner than the estimated delivery date. Ralph Lauren reserves the right to send packages via other shipping methods based on the shipping destination as long as orders will still arrive within the arrival times outlined on RalphLauren.com. When you choose the Economy delivery option, packages are delivered Monday through Saturday 8 AM to 4:30 PM. Orders sent by Fast, 2-Business-Day or Next-Day shipping methods are delivered Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 4:30 PM. We recommend choosing Fast or Next-Day delivery if you are shipping your package to a business address. You will be asked to provide a telephone number on the shipping page of checkout, which is important in the event the courier needs to arrange a delivery time with you. You will also be asked to provide an email address, to which we will send confirmation that your order was placed.

settings.title:
What Is Inside your
StarlinkKit when you
receive it from Starlink?
settings.titlesale:
Your Starlink kit includes a basic basestand,(an ideal option for ground-level installation) to test your connection to the Starlink Constellation and broadband network.

Once you order your Kit fromStarlink.com, you will receive your package at your doorstep with WiFi, cables, router, and base. Starlinkâ€™s premium quality digital device will provide high-speed internet to enable video calls to online gaming.

Since the Starlink kits are already connected with the things required to access the internet, you just need to install the Starlink App that helps determine the best installation location. Once you find it, plug Your Starlink in and within 10 min your online.

When your ready to permanently mount your super fast Starlink Internet Dishy you can choose one of our Starlink Shop Australian made, high quality, compatible Starlink Mounts or Starlink Adapters form Starlink Shop Australia.

settings.section-heading: How to Install Starlink roof Mount Kit

settings.section-textarea:
Living in a remote area without landline internet options! Starlink offers high-speed broadband internet across most the world with speeds only the big cities usually enjoy. We at Starlink Shop Australia, provide custom mounting solutions specifically designed to handle our harsh conditions and Australian style roof construction, that are compatible with both Gen 1 and Gen 2 Starlink Dishy equipment.

We provide prompt services and shipping in all coverage areas to bridge the digital gap even in urban areas.

settings.section-heading: *Starlink Shop is in no way associated with Starlink or SpaceX.

settings.description:
SpaceTek are not affiliated with Starlink however we are here to do our best to help.

Please follow these steps to contact Starlink Directly.

Login to your Starlink portal at https://auth.starlink.com/

Navigate to the Support Section

Choose any of the support articles then select the thumbs down icon at the bottom.

Here you can send a support request.

If you are unable to access your account, have not received your confirmation email or cant retrieve your password you can try these steps copied from the critical information summary.

"The Starlink customer service team may be contacted any time at starlinkresolutions@spacex.com, through the customer portal by logging into your account on starlink.com or by calling 1800 954 824. "

settings.section-heading: CLICK ON MARKER TO DISPLAY DETAILS!!
settings.section-textarea:
Note: All recommended Installers use SpaceTek products and have a reputation for quality work.

In no way is SpaceTek Pty. Ltd. responsible for damages or disputes by or with these installers.

When speaking with these installer please mention you were referred by SpaceTek.
